程序包com.classic.core.activity的分层结构

程序包分层结构:
  • 所有程序包

类分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.classic.core.activity.BaseActivityStack
    • com.classic.core.activity.BaseSplashActivity.SplashImgResource (implements java.io.Serializable)
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity (implements android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, android.view.Window.OnWindowDismissedCallback)
            • com.classic.core.activity.BaseSplashActivity
            • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
              • android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity (implements android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable)
                • com.classic.core.activity.BaseActivity (implements com.classic.core.interfaces.I_Activity, com.classic.core.interfaces.I_Register, android.view.View.OnClickListener)
    • android.os.Handler
      • com.classic.core.activity.BaseSplashActivity.UIHandler
